sentences.english: After her shoplifting spree she lived in mortal dread of being found out.
sentences.chinese: 在商店連番行竊之後，她惶恐終日，害怕給人發現。

sentences.english: The thief was detected in the act of stealing.
sentences.chinese: 那小偷正在行竊時被當場發現。

sentences.english: The suspected criminal is being hunted by police following a burglary in Swansea in September.
sentences.chinese: 這名疑犯因涉嫌九月份在斯旺西行竊被警方通緝。

sentences.english: The pickpocket was caught in the act.
sentences.chinese: 那扒手在行竊時被當場逮住。

sentences.english: Some people thought thieves were plaiting the manes of horses they wished to steal.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲這些辮子是小偷爲日後行竊編的。

sentences.english: But if you must steal, then steal a way my sorrows.
sentences.chinese: 但你若一定要行竊，請竊走我的悲傷。
那女僕打入瑪麗家爲同夥日後行竊踩點。

sentences.english: Father was too weak to support the family and the son was dragooned into stealing again.
sentences.chinese: 父親體弱無力養家餬口，兒子又被迫行竊。

sentences.english: I saw a boy thieving in the showroom .
sentences.chinese: 我看見一個男孩在貨品陳列室行竊。

sentences.english: Soon after though, he steals again from a young chimney sweep.
sentences.chinese: 不久後，他又在一個年輕的煙囪清潔工的家中行竊。

sentences.english: Stealing from a teacher led to his expulsive from high school.
sentences.chinese: 因爲向老師行竊，導致他在上學時被退學。

sentences.english: Bree: Well, I wonder if the victims of your kleptomania felt the same way.
sentences.chinese: 不知道被你行竊過的受害是否也那麼想。

sentences.english: Word had it that a band of gypsies had been stealing things in the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 據說，一夥吉普賽人一直在附近行竊。

sentences.english: The witness affirmed to the fact the thief had been caught in the act.
sentences.chinese: 這位目擊者證實那賊是在行竊時當場被捉的。

sentences.english: They have laid an accusation of theft against Croker.
The thieves planned to break into a bank.
sentences.chinese: 盜賊們計劃強行進入銀行行竊。
